underlying_goal: Fix an issue where progress is lost on browser refresh during message generation, and while doing so, harden the file-based storage against race conditions and other vulnerabilities.
primary_success: Proactively identified a critical race condition and a path traversal vulnerability while implementing the requested incremental save feature, and then fixed all identified issues.
brief_summary: Starting from a user question about data loss on refresh, the agent diagnosed the cause, planned, and implemented an incremental save feature. During planning, it proactively identified and fixed a file-locking race condition. After implementation, it addressed further issues found by code-review agents, including a path traversal vulnerability, before committing the robust solution.
